item.title: Artificial Intelligence Model Serving Framework Vulnerability
item.description: A critical vulnerability was discovered in an artificial intelligence model serving framework that allows unauthorized access.

item.title: Yokogawa FAST/TOOLS ICS Advisory
item.description: Yokogawa FAST/TOOLS versions R9.01 through R10.04 contain multiple vulnerabilities in the SCADA interface.

item.title: Autonomous Vehicle Fleet Management System Alert
item.description: An autonomous vehicle fleet management system has a vulnerability in its computer vision processing pipeline.

item.title: Generic Router Firmware Update
item.description: A buffer overflow was found in the router firmware affecting MAIN board processing.
